model_answer: The close-up of a hand stretching a red rubber band on a wooden surface occurs between 00:05:53 and 00:06:34, as described in the provided options.

The correct answer is B: [00:00:33 - 00:01:15]. 

In the provided audio clip, the on-screen words “Nuclear Fission Breaking Nuclei Apart” are visible from 00:00:19 to 00:00:40. This is followed by black-and-white images of bombs labeled “Fat Man” and “Little Boy” from 00:00:42 to 00:00:67. The speaker then introduces nuclear fission's use in the first nuclear weapons at 00:00:68. Finally, an upbeat blues-rock guitar riff starts at 00:01:13.

Therefore, the segment where all these elements occur together is from 00:00:33 to 00:01:15.
